slides.title: Khatushyam - Salasar - Sawariya Seth
slides.description: Embark on a soulful journey to the most revered shrines of Rajasthan. Seek blessings at Khatushyam Ji, Salasar Balaji, and Savanriya Seth — a divine trail of devotion and faith. Perfect for devotees looking for a quick yet spiritually fulfilling trip.

slides.title: Shravan Special 5 Jyotirlingas - Ashtvinayak
slides.description: Celebrate the holy month of Shravan with the sacred darshan of 5 Jyotirlingas and the divine Ashtvinayak temples in Maharashtra. A rare opportunity to connect deeply with Lord Shiva and Lord Ganesha on this powerful pilgrimage.

slides.title: Tirupati – Madurai – Kanyakumari – Rameshwaram – Trivandrum
slides.description: Explore the spiritual gems of South India — from the majestic Tirupati Balaji to the shores of Kanyakumari. Discover ancient temples, oceanfront shrines, and centuries of tradition in this unforgettable yatra through the divine south.

slides.title: Char Dham Yatra
slides.description: Experience India’s most sacred pilgrimage — the Char Dham Yatra. Journey through the Himalayas to seek blessings at Badrinath, Kedarnath, Gangotri, and Yamunotri. A life-changing spiritual adventure awaits.

reviews.title: Our Happy Yatrees
reviews.subtitle: Hear from our fellow devotees about their transformative spiritual journeys and sacred experiences

reviewData.review: I had an absolutely mesmerizing Darshan of Mata Rani. The entire trip was wonderfully organized by Mamta Foundation. From perfect hotel arrangements to delicious and hygienic food, everything was taken care of with great attention to detail I am truly pleased and grateful for the smooth and thoughtful arrangements. I would highly urge more senior citizens to take part in such spiritual journeys.  Jai Mata Di!

reviewData.reviewerName: Youngest Yatri with a Heart Full of Joy
reviewData.review: I am the youngest yatri of Mamta Foundation, and I thoroughly enjoyed this wonderful trip to Vrindavan.The entire experience was memorable, with comfortable hotel stays and delicious food. I had a great time and will definitely join again in the future.  Jai Shri Krishna!

As an NRI, I was truly impressed by the hospitality provided by Mamta Foundation. The food and staff both deserve a full 10 out of 10.We thoroughly enjoyed the entire trip, and I will definitely recommend it to my group and other people abroad as well.The hotel and food arrangements were simply the best!.  Jai Shri Krishna!

Many described it as the best food they’ve ever had during a yatra, with consistent praise for the taste, hygiene, and variety. Some even mentioned it was better than home-cooked meals.The arrangements were top-notch, and the dedication of the Mamta Foundation in ensuring quality meals did not go unnoticed.
